      • writeNVRAM

        public void writeNVRAM(int slaveID,
              byte[] data)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Write data to NV memory.

        This command preserves data for each slave in a separate slot. If there is already data in slot, it will be overwritten. Data to be written can be up to 128 bytes. If empty data field is sent, data will be erased.

        Parameters:
        slaveID - slave identifier.
        data - data to be written in NV memory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • readNVRAM

        public byte[] readNVRAM(int slaveID)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Read data from NV memory.

        Return data written in NV memory for the selected slave ID.

        Parameters:
        slaveID - slave identifier.
        Returns:
        Data field contains all data read from the NV memory slot for the selected slave ID. If no data has been written, this field will be empty and Data field length will be 00h
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • setBaudRate

        public void setBaudRate(int slaveID,
               int baudRate)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Set RS232 baud rate.
        Parameters:

      • getUsbDeviceDescriptor

        public byte[] getUsbDeviceDescriptor(int slaveID)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Get USB device descriptor.

        Return device descriptor from specified slave, which should be of USB type.

        Parameters:
        slaveID - slave identifier.
        Returns:
        device descriptor as is returned from slave.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • getUsbStringDescriptor

        public java.lang.String getUsbStringDescriptor(int slaveID)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Get USB string descriptor.
        Parameters:
        slaveID - slave identifier.
        Returns:
        ASCII string descriptor.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • setAppleChargeCurrent

        public void setAppleChargeCurrent(int current)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Set Apple devices charge current.

        This settings is stored in NV memory and is used for all slave channels.

        Parameters:
        current - Charge current in mA.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
